If you love to play cards, The Gardens is your place to get lucky! Game On.

How it All Started

Our Casino is owned by the Nooksack Tribe, and opened in 2007. It is conveniently located in Lynden, only 10 minutes from either Lynden/Aldergrove or Sumas/Abbotsford border crossings. The Nooksack Tribe is a federally recognized American Indian Nation of over 1800 enrolled members.

Напитки на любой вкус!

Все что нужно для комфортного проведени времени

We’re Awesome

You are welcome to park your RV overnight at Our Casino! We have 10 available spots, 8 of which are equipped with 30 Amp power hookups. Spots are awarded on a first come, first served basis, at a cost of $7 per night for Winners Club members, and $30 per night for non-members. Please come to the Cashier when you arrive to pay for your spot. Click here to learn how to earn FREE nights.

Silver Seven
